name: Black Widow
description: Originally created by legendary breeder Shantibaba when he was co-owner of Green House Seeds, Black Widow was then known as White Widow. When Shantibaba left GHS and found Mr. Nice Seeds, he took the original Brazilian sativa mother and South Indian indica-dominant hybrid father with him to recreate his world renowned White Widow seeds. Because GHS and others were selling seeds with the name White Widow, he changed the name to Black Widow to create a distinction between them. Black Widow is now considered by many to be the only “true” White Widow available in seed form, as Mr. Nice is the lone seed breeder to possess the original parental genetics.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Creative, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Pain, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Headache, Anxious
